item.title: 特朗普有望放弃《国防生产法》要求，以促进关键矿产和武器的发展
item.description: 据路透社看到的一份文件显示，唐纳德-特朗普预计将放弃国防生产的法定要求，包括国会对大型项目的批准，以帮助提高国内关键矿物和武器的生产。【原文：Donald Trump is expected to waive statutory requirements under the Defense Production, including congressional approval for larger projects, to help boost domestic production of critical minerals and weapons, according to a document seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 中国拒绝荷兰部长的间谍指控，称技术成果并非 "窃取 "而来
item.description: 荷兰国防部长指责中国政府加强间谍活动，特别是在半导体领域，而中国周二否认其科技成就是由于 "窃取 "了知识产权。【原文：China denied on Tuesday that its scientific and technological achievements were due to "stolen" intellectual property, after comments by the Dutch defence minister accusing Beijing of intensifying its espionage, especially on semiconductors.】

item.title: 随着愤怒情绪的增长，古巴部分收回了上调的互联网费率
item.description: 古巴表示，将开始以大幅降价的方式为学生提供额外的移动互联网数据计划，而在此之前，最初的费率上调已在这个因通货膨胀飙升和基本商品短缺而陷入困境的岛国引起了众怒。【原文：Cuba said it would begin to offer additional mobile internet data plans at a sharply reduced price for students after an initial rate hike prompted outrage across an island already reeling from soaring inflation and shortages of basic goods.】

item.title: 文件显示，欧盟反垄断监管机构对威士卡和万事达卡的调查升级
item.description: 据路透社看到的文件显示，欧盟反垄断监管机构正在询问零售商和支付公司，威士卡和万事达卡的标准化费用汇总以及提高收费透明度是否能解决他们的担忧。【原文：EU antitrust regulators are asking retailers and payments companies whether a standardized summary of fees by Visa and Mastercard and more transparency on the charges would address their concerns, according to documents seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 美国航空公司希望联邦航空局推迟飞行甲板二级屏障要求
item.description: 本周二，美国联邦航空管理局（Federal Aviation Administration）表示，要求新客机在飞行甲板上设置第二道屏障以防止入侵的规定将于 8 月份生效，各大航空公司希望联邦航空管理局推迟该规定的实施时间。【原文：Major airlines want the Federal Aviation Administration to delay a requirement set to take effect in August requiring that new passenger airplanes have a secondary barrier to the flight deck to prevent intrusions, the agency said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 韩国新领导人将为美国贸易谈判争取更多时间
item.description: 据熟悉韩国执政党想法的消息人士透露，韩国新政府可能会努力为美国贸易谈判争取时间，同时研究较大的邻国日本和中国的谈判情况，以寻找筹码。【原文：The new South Korean administration will likely make efforts to buy time for U.S. trade talks, as it studies the negotiations of bigger neighbours Japan and China for leverage, according to sources familiar with the ruling party's thinking.】

item.title: 全球数以千计的用户无法使用 Reddit
item.description: 据停电跟踪网站 Downdetector.com 称，社交媒体平台 Reddit 周二有超过 2.6 万名用户宕机。【原文：Social media platform Reddit was down for over 26,000 users on Tuesday, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 马斯克称特朗普的减税和支出法案 "令人厌恶憎恨
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周二加大了对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统一直在推动国会共和党同僚支持的全面税收和支出法案的批评力度，称其为 "令人作呕的憎恶"，将增加财政赤字。【原文：Elon Musk on Tuesday amplified his criticism of the sweeping tax and spending bill that President Donald Trump has been pushing fellow Republicans in Congress to embrace, calling it a "disgusting abomination" that will increase the deficit.】

item.title: 摩根大通资深员工安迪-奥布莱恩在华尔街巨头任职 40 年后退休
item.description: 根据路透社周二看到的一份内部备忘录，摩根大通贷款资本战略全球主管安迪-奥布莱恩（Andy O'Brien）将于 2025 年底退休，他在这家美国最大的贷款机构工作了 40 年。【原文：Andy O'Brien, the global head of loan capital strategy at JPMorgan Chase , is set to retire at the end of 2025 after 40 years at the largest U.S. lender, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 白宫：美国本周寻求各国提出最佳贸易提议
item.description: 白宫发言人卡罗琳-利维特（Karoline Leavitt）周二表示，美国已要求各国在周三之前就贸易谈判提出最佳方案，因为美国官员正在加紧努力，争取在唐纳德-特朗普总统自我设定的仅剩五周的最后期限之前向其提交多项协议。【原文：The U.S. has asked countries to make their best offers on trade negotiations by Wednesday, White House spokeswoman Karoline Leavitt said on Tuesday, as U.S. officials ramp up efforts to deliver multiple agreements to President Donald Trump before a self-imposed deadline just five weeks away.】

item.title: 贝塔技术公司首次实现全电动飞机着陆
item.description: 贝塔技术公司（Beta Technologies）和港务局周二表示，该公司成为首家在纽约-新泽西地区机场降落全电动飞机的美国公司。【原文：Beta Technologies became the first U.S. company to land an all-electric aircraft at an airport in the New York-New Jersey region, the company and port authorities said in Tuesday.】

item.title: 白宫表示，特朗普将签署命令，将金属关税提高一倍
item.description: 白宫发言人卡罗琳-利维特（Karoline Leavitt）在一次简报会上告诉记者，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将于周二签署一项行政命令，正式宣誓将钢铁和铝的关税提高一倍。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump will sign an executive order on Tuesday making official his vow to double tariffs on steel and aluminum, White House spokeswoman Karoline Leavitt told reporters in a briefing.】

item.title: 美联储主席古尔斯比称关税可能迅速刺激通胀，但需要更长时间才能减缓经济增速
item.description: 芝加哥联储主席奥斯汀-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）周二表示，美国征收进口关税可能会很快导致通胀上升，但他表示，关税导致的经济放缓需要更长的时间。【原文：Chicago Federal Reserve President Austan Goolsbee on Tuesday said higher inflation from U.S. import tariffs could become evident quickly, but he said it would take longer to see a tariff-induced economic slowdown.】

item.title: 花旗银行将放弃限制向销售枪支的零售客户提供服务的政策
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup）周二表示，公司将撤销 2018 年的一项政策，该政策限制向销售枪支的零售客户提供银行服务，理由是最近的监管发展。【原文：Citigroup said on Tuesday it was rolling back a 2018 policy that placed restrictions on providing banking services to retail clients selling firearms, citing recent regulatory developments.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克说，2025 年 SpaceX 的收入将达到约 155 亿美元
item.description: 亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周二表示，他的火箭制造商太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）今年的收入将达到约 155 亿美元。【原文：Elon Musk's rocket maker SpaceX will record revenue of about $15.5 billion this year, the billionaire said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美联储库克认为有证据表明贸易政策拖累经济
item.description: 美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）周二表示，由于特朗普政府的贸易政策开始对经济造成压力，美国的货币政策正处于应对不同经济形势的有利位置。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook said on Tuesday that U.S. monetary policy is in a good place to respond to different economic scenarios as the Trump administration's trade policy is starting to weigh on the economy.】

item.title: 俄罗斯亿万富翁表示，更换 SAP 软件成本高昂，但非常必要
item.description: 俄罗斯钢铁业亿万富翁阿列克谢-莫尔达绍夫（Alexey Mordashov）说，开发国产替代品以取代德国 SAP 公司生产的、被广泛使用的商业软件，需要比预期更多的时间和资金，但这关系到公司的生死存亡。【原文：Russian steel billionaire Alexey Mordashov said that developing a homegrown alternative to the widely-used business software made by Germany's SAP will require more time and money than anticipated but is a matter of survival.】

item.title: 中国关键矿产出口禁令生效，全球警钟长鸣
item.description: 中国 4 月份决定暂停出口多种关键矿物和磁铁，这扰乱了对全球汽车制造商、航空航天制造商、半导体公司和军事承包商至关重要的供应链。【原文：China's decision in April to suspend exports of a wide range of critical minerals and magnets has upended the supply chains central to automakers, aerospace manufacturers, semiconductor companies and military contractors around the world.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，Qwant 要求法国监管机构对微软采取临时措施
item.description: 直接了解此事的人士称，Qwant公司已要求法国反垄断监管机构对微软采取行动，指控微软通过必应平台降低了法国搜索引擎的搜索结果质量。【原文：Qwant has asked France's antitrust regulator to take action against Microsoft for allegedly driving down the quality of the French search engine's results via Microsoft's Bing platform, people with direct knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: Capital One 必须面对社交媒体创作者指控佣金被盗的诉讼
item.description: Capital One 必须面对社交媒体创建者的诉讼，这些创建者称，该银行的免费浏览器扩展功能在消费者购买其产品和服务时窃取了他们的销售佣金。【原文：Capital One must face a lawsuit by social media creators who said the bank's free browser extension stole their sales commissions when consumers bought their products and services.】

item.title: 纽约联储宣布 2024 年债券持有量将出现 1.06 万亿美元未实现损失
item.description: 根据纽约联邦储备银行周二发布的一份报告，美联储去年在其持有的资产上出现了 1 万亿美元的未实现损失。【原文：The Federal Reserve saw $1 trillion in unrealized losses on its holdings last year, according to a report released Tuesday by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York.】

item.title: 航空航天业警告美国新关税可能危及航空安全和供应链
item.description: 代表美国和全球主要航空航天公司的一个团体周二警告说，对进口商用飞机、喷气发动机和零部件征收新关税可能会危及航空安全和供应链，或产生意想不到的后果。【原文：A group representing major U.S. and global aeropsace companies on Tuesday warned new tariffs on imported commercial aircraft, jet engines and parts could put air safety and the supply chain at risk or have unintended consequences.】

item.title: 消息人士称，利洁时寻求新方案以推进 Air Wick 部门的出售
item.description: 英国利洁时公司（Reckitt）正在考虑新的方案，以推进出售其基本家居业务（Essential Home），该公司是 Air Wick 清新剂和 Cillit Bang 清洁剂的生产商。【原文：Britain's Reckitt is considering new options to advance a sale of its Essential Home business, home to Air Wick fresheners and Cillit Bang cleaners, after bids came in below expectations, two people with knowledge of the process said.】

item.title: Palantir 无惧科技界阴霾，特朗普势头推动股价大幅上涨
item.description: Palantir Technologies 今年在大多数科技股挣扎的领域取得了成功：在冷却的市场中保持热度。【原文：Palantir Technologies has succeeded where most tech stocks have struggled this year: staying hot in a cooling market.】

item.title: 美国 4 月份工厂订单下滑
item.description: 美国制成品的新订单在 4 月份大幅下降，企业的设备支出在第二季度伊始似乎失去了动力，因为在关税之前提前采购所带来的提振作用逐渐减弱。【原文：New orders for U.S.-manufactured goods dropped sharply in April and business spending on equipment appeared to have lost momentum at the start of the second quarter as the boost from front-loading of purchases ahead of tariffs faded.】

item.title: 所有者从周三起暂停 Pornhub、YouPorn 和 RedTube 在法国的业务
item.description: Pornhub、YouPorn 和 RedTube 背后的公司将从周三起暂停这些成人内容平台在法国的访问，有媒体称此举是为了抗议色情网站要求验证其用户是否年满 18 岁。【原文：The firm behind Pornhub, YouPorn and RedTube is suspending access to the adult content platforms in France from Wednesday, in a move that media said was in protest against a requirement for porn sites to verify that their users are 18 or older.】

item.title: 俄罗斯计划在空间站中集成国产人工智能模型
item.description: 俄罗斯航天局（Roscosmos）局长周二表示，俄罗斯计划将其自主研发的Gigachat人工智能模型集成到国际空间站（ISS）的IT系统中。【原文：Russia plans to integrate its homegrown Gigachat artificial intelligence model into IT systems on the International Space Station (ISS), the head of space agency Roscosmos said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国 4 月份职位空缺反弹；裁员人数回升
item.description: 美国 4 月份的职位空缺有所增加，但裁员人数回升，这与关税导致经济前景暗淡、劳动力市场放缓的趋势一致。【原文：U.S. job openings increased in April, but layoffs picked up in a move consistent with a slowing labor market amid a dimming economic outlook because of tariffs.】

item.title: 意大利努力重振落后的光纤铺设计划
item.description: 三位消息人士称，意大利政府推动国家支持的电信公司 Open Fiber 和 FiberCop 加快欧盟资助的网络计划的工作遇到了阻碍，因为这两家公司正在努力就潜在交易的条款达成一致。【原文：A push by Italy's government for state-backed telecoms firms Open Fiber and FiberCop to accelerate work on a European Union-funded network plan has hit a snag as the companies are struggling to agree terms of a potential deal, three sources said.】

item.title: 前 SpaceX 工程师的 Impulse Space 公司融资 3 亿美元扩充太空拖船队
item.description: Impulse Space 是一家开发轨道转移飞行器（俗称 "太空拖船"）的太空技术初创公司，在 Linse Capital 领投的一轮后期融资中筹集了 3 亿美元，使该公司的融资总额达到 5.25 亿美元。【原文：Impulse Space, a space technology startup developing orbital transfer vehicles commonly known as "space tugs," has raised $300 million in a late-stage funding round led by Linse Capital, bringing the company's total funding to $525 million.】
